phrases.phrase: 남편 복 없는 여자는[년은] 자식 복도 없다
meanings: A woman[bitch] without the luck of having a good husband does not have the luck of having a good child

vlive.korean: 야 너 내 남편 맞니? Are you really my husband? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 그날 밤 일 죽어도 얘기 안하려고...[넘버식스]ep7.
남편분이랑 보세요? You are watching this with your husband? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: You are watching this with your husband?

vlive.korean: 네가 내 남편만 꼬셨니? You not only flirted with my husband. 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 그날 밤 일 죽어도 얘기 안하려고...[넘버식스]ep7.
vlive.english: You not only flirted with my husband.

vlive.korean: 조민주 너 내 남편이랑 바람 폈지? Minju, you had an affair with my husband didn't you? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 이제 정말 끝내야 하지 않을까? 이 지구달 놀이는?[넘버식스] ep6.
vlive.english: Minju, you had an affair with my husband didn't you?

vlive.korean: 내가 네 남편 잠꼬대까지 변명해야 되니? Do I have to explain myself for your husband talking in his sleep? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 이제 정말 끝내야 하지 않을까? 이 지구달 놀이는?[넘버식스] ep6.
vlive.english: Do I have to explain myself for your husband talking in his sleep?

examples.korean: She grieved the death of her husband. 발음듣기 그녀는 남편의 죽음을 비통해 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She grieved the death of her husband. 발음

examples.korean: She rests beside her husband in the local cemetery. 발음듣기 그녀는 지역 묘지에 그녀의 남편 옆에 잠들어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She rests beside her husband in the local cemetery. 발음

examples.korean: Her husband had been deceiving her for years. 발음듣기 그녀의 남편이 그녀를 수년 동안 속여 왔던 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her husband had been deceiving her for years. 발음

examples.korean: She felt betrayed by her husband’s desertion. 발음듣기 그녀는 남편이 떠난 것에 배신감을 느꼈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She felt betrayed by her husband’s desertion. 발음

examples.korean: Her husband was very loving, but she felt smothered. 발음듣기 그녀의 남편은 애정이 넘쳤지만 그녀는 숨이 막히는 기분이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her husband was very loving, but she felt smothered. 발음
